title: I’m a Villainess, Can I Die? - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Manhwa   Apathetic Protagonist   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Depression   Distrustful Protagonist   European Ambience   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Inferiority Complex   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Master-Servant Relationship   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Possession   Royalty   Second Chance   Sibling's Care   Sister Complex   Stoic Characters   Suicides   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Hi My Dear   하이마이디어
description:
My sick sibling died so my usefulness is over.

With that I choose to die, but I became a villainess in a third-rate novel?!

In face of miserable end, I thought I can end this troublesome life with my own hands…

But why do they keep trying to save me?

“Don’t take your partner status from me, Selina.”

“Can you dare to be greedy?”

My life is getting better and better, and the day I will die is coming. What should I do?>
